basics.name: Nguyen Van Hao
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: A curisous and hard-working person who is passionate about data and technology. I am looking for a position where I can apply my knowledge and skills to solve real-world problems.

work.name: Breathtaking Vietnam Agency
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.
highlights: Find and build relationships with new clients who are marketing leaders at their companies or SME owners
Present proposals to clients and negotiate contracts
Act as a bridge between clients and internal teams to ensure the smooth flow of information and communication, ensure the quality of work and meet deadlines
Manage the project budget and ensure the project is profitable
Manage the project team and ensure the project is completed on time and meets the client's requirements

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

certificates.title: Digital Literacy Certification - IC3 Certification
certificates.summary: A global benchmark for basic computer literacy, including operating systems, hardware, software (almost Mircosoft Offices), and networks.
